title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
created_time: September 04, 2023, 12:50:51 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 09:56:26 PM by krogothmanhattan
content: Creating this thread to be a reference to any new Ballet custom cards I made for my CypherHODL free raffles.      Arriving sometime this week will be the one pictured below of my painting Bitcoin Dawn https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5147522.0      The two current different variations will be in the raffle and past winners will have the option to choose a new one they do not have.     Any new winner will be sent a random card.      The cypherhodl Bitcoin dawn ballet card will be loaded with $1 equivalent in BTC at the time of loading.      If you notice the new card has no currency value. They only to do it was with the orange box and that IMO would ruin the artwork.      So I chose just to add my company name and nothing else....and I think it is better this way.      Future Ballet custom card made will most likely depend on my mood and also will have my copyrighted artwork on them.     So goodluck yea all!

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: I love these!Thank you so much for all the free raffles you have done and continue to do. I really like the art work alone on the second card. In the past it was so enjoyable to collect these personalized versions of scamkey cards. After "le shame" of coldkey I am really glad to see the tradition continuing with a better company/product etc. I can't wait to see what other versions people and CypherHold create with the Ballet cards. I love the hunt to find the personalized cards to add these to my Ballet card collection. Geophphreigh

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on September 04, 2023, 02:45:14 PMI love these!Thank you so much for all the free raffles you have done and continue to do. I really like the art work alone on the second card. In the past it was so enjoyable to collect these personalized versions of scamkey cards. After "le shame" of coldkey I am really glad to see the tradition continuing with a better company/product etc. I can't wait to see what other versions people and CypherHold create with the Ballet cards. I love the hunt to find the personalized cards to add these to my Ballet card collection. Geophphreigh    Thanks for the kind words!  Yes I made the same card with that artwork with Shitkey and it came out awesome....so couldnt wait to replicate on a Ballet card....and looking from the pic they sent me its just as awesome as the Shitkey ones!

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: What a great idea. They came out so cool. Nice work.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Updated pic with cards placed side by side.

comments.author: BD Technical
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on September 19, 2023, 09:57:07 PM Updated pic with cards placed side by side.Oh my god I'm just wondering how you did such a beautiful art.  Everything seems like a dream.  Not everyone can art the beautiful scenery of Bitcoin.  However, I have been looking at your post for the past few days and if I can't do it like you, I am continuing to try to make art in a similar way.  Hope something good happens.  And in this art of yours, after the bright future of people in Bitcoin, it is seen that Bitcoin is sinking and people are falling into despair.  In fact, this painting is related to real life and because of getting a real image, the image is more prominent.  Really nice painting.  You are a great artist.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: BD Technical on October 08, 2023, 04:37:47 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on September 19, 2023, 09:57:07 PM Updated pic with cards placed side by side.Oh my god I'm just wondering how you did such a beautiful art.  Everything seems like a dream.  Not everyone can art the beautiful scenery of Bitcoin.  However, I have been looking at your post for the past few days and if I can't do it like you, I am continuing to try to make art in a similar way.  Hope something good happens.  And in this art of yours, after the bright future of people in Bitcoin, it is seen that Bitcoin is sinking and people are falling into despair.  In fact, this painting is related to real life and because of getting a real image, the image is more prominent.  Really nice painting.  You are a great artist.  Thanks for the kind words....but that painting is Bitcoin Dawn, and the sun is rising and those are the evil bankers running away from it like a vampire would run away from the sun.....you can read more here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5147522.0   So I came up with the idea of having the Bitcoin Sun rising in the distance…..shown in all its splendor and glory. On the left are the people who see the Bitcoin sun and point…as they marvel and are joyous for its beauty and its liberating rays piercing the night sky. To the right are the evil bankers who flee away from the Bitcoin Sun rays to hide like the vampires that they are. They are shamed for their avarice,greed,sins and run away from the freedom the Crypto sun will be providing the rest of humanity in liberating us from their hodl on the monetary system.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Just catching up on older stuff in my watchlist - Gotta say, that was one of my all-time favorite cold-scam cards. They were beautiful.I Have dowloaded an pretty big image of that artwork and it's one of my monitor's desktop wallpaper. I would love to see a nice print of this if you ever get that far or run some? It would look awesome on a wall, but probably smaller than your original!

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on October 10, 2023, 11:55:05 PMJust catching up on older stuff in my watchlist - Gotta say, that was one of my all-time favorite cold-scam cards. They were beautiful.I Have dowloaded an pretty big image of that artwork and it's one of my monitor's desktop wallpaper. I would love to see a nice print of this if you ever get that far or run some? It would look awesome on a wall, but probably smaller than your original!     Glad you like my artwork!  Not a bad idea in making a poster of my painting!...Perhaps someday I might give it a try

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on October 11, 2023, 08:59:26 AMGlad you like my artwork!  Not a bad idea in making a poster of my painting!...Perhaps someday I might give it a try  That would be cool, lmk indeed I'll be first in line! BTW, I finally received that "lost" card, thanks again, now I will have both designs after the last win! ... Love them, great job man, very classy!

comments.author: 1Dq

You did a hell of a job in bringing my vision to fruition!  Thanks and welcome back!  Long time no see!

comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on October 29, 2023, 09:50:13 AMIndeed! You did a hell of a job in bringing my vision to fruition!  Thanks and welcome back!  Long time no see!I would like a poster of that one, myself!

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: Sounds great!There must be upcoming crypto art projects coming up or else I might explode!!

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on October 30, 2023, 08:15:29 AMHmmm....That an idea that might come to fruition one of these days  Damn I really really really hope so. I'd frame that bitch up so nice!  I also admit, it was my favorite cold-scam card as well. Killed me to peel it, thanks to the f'n "yoggening".  Quote from: 1Dq on October 30, 2023, 11:54:40 AMSounds great!There must be upcoming crypto art projects coming up or else I might explode!!Get a hold of @Cygan for a new series of Icarus cards maybe? Would love to see your work there too!  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5435930.msg63063099#msg63063099

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Awesome wallets!!!  Surprised these giveaway raffles don't have a higher participation rate.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Today ran out of the two card that I have been raffling for awhile. So its time I place the latest ballet card design.   It features a design I made years ago sheet of 20 BTC Bitbills under the lens in neon fashion.

comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on May 17, 2024, 12:01:03 PMAwesome wallets!!!  Surprised these giveaway raffles don't have a higher participation rate.Oh, so true!Quote from: krogothmanhattan on July 14, 2024, 04:34:05 PM   Today ran out of the two card that I have been raffling for awhile.
